Description: ? Carry out in-house site surveys, engineering / design.Skills
Skills: ? A strong technical background in water sector with minimum 10 years’ experience in potable water conveyance systems or similar environment, including at least 6 years’ experiences at Supervisory level.
Experiences in environmental engineering and quantity surveying is desirable. Experiences in reviewing tenders, estimating, and overseeing contractors is required.
? Demonstrable experience of potable water supply network including expertise in water loss, water data analytics and related asset management.
? Ability to identify and utilize relevant engineering standards and Codes related to civil engineering including AWWA, IWA publications and others related to water industry.
? Good communications and presentation skills with fluency in English Primary Duties and Responsibilities:
? Conduct discipline engineering activities for projects, from initial concept definition phase through engineering studies, FEED, detailed design and commissioning.
